name: Mori Carta
description:
Features
Deceptively simple controls: Almost every interaction in the game is handled with a simple swipe left or right.

Engaging story: Adventure with a colorful cast of characters that accompany you on your adventures.

Rich depth of builds and combos: Choosing cards to add to your deck will be critical in surviving your adventures. With over 1000 cards, the combinations are endless.

3 dramatically different characters with their own unique card sets.
1000+ playable cards.
185 unique enemies.
